availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas H. Heath (Cincinnati, Ohio, bricklayer and brick mason. )

body.p: Cincinnati, Ohio, bricklayer and brick mason. Virginian native. Married to Maxey Anne Valandingham Heath. Father of Augustus Heath, Phillip Heath, Thomas Heath, Benjamine F. Heath, John H. Heath. Bricklayer in Cincinnati in 1850. Brick mason in Cincinnati in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 9, p. 845A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 8, p. 271.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clermont County, Williamsburg, p. 418B.
